name: Sam the Slime Slayer
description:
A game made for the Ludum Dare 44.

Controls:
W A S D: Movement
Space : Attack
E :Start Waves

You are controlling Sam, one guy who found a sword in his garden and now needs to kill every single slime in the world!

Enter in a game where your life is currency, wich means that the only coin that you have is your own health. Once you beat a wave you will have to choose between 3 upgrades wich have 1 positive effect and 1 negative effect becoming more powerful but also more vulnerable.

Good luck and thank you for playing.
